# Introduction

Over the last few years, monitoring technology have taken a leap and helped free the many physical constraints carry-on sensors like GPS-trackers, accelerometers, and gyroscope posed. This has paved way for academic research in the field of tracking and classifying data collected from numerous human activities through means of wearable smartwatches.
